akn:section.akn:heading: Carrying of concealed firearms by qualified retired law enforcement officers

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Notwithstanding any other provision of the law of any State or any political subdivision thereof, an individual who is a qualified retired law enforcement officer and who is carrying the identification required by subsection (d) may carry a concealed firearm that has been shipped or transported in interstate or foreign commerce, subject to subsection (b).
